titleStmt.title: A more exact relation of the siege laid to the town of Leicester: how it was maintained, and how lost, and what quarter was given by the Kings forces. / Delivered in to the Honourable House of Commons by Sir Robert Pye governour of the said town, and Major Iames Ennis, June 10. 1645. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Pye, Robert, Sir, d. 1701.
Innes, James, Major.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Field for Laurance Chapman,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
